name: Honey Town
description:
This game is in alpha stage, but not really bugs we're aware of. 

You can explore the town and meet some characters, the main purpose of the town visit will be to speak with Anna (the librarian) and buy cows after you earned enough money from harvesting.

It might be that the game takes too long or that you deplete your stamina very quickly, we're working on it, by the moment you start with 120 points of stamina, or two full hearts.

Corn and tomato plants won't grow in Spring no matter what. They will only grow in Summer. Potatoes and turnips are Spring's harvest.

The game also runs on Xbox One but hasn't reached a stage in which to publish with Microsoft.
